channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- FactoryCameraFB
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- FactoryCameraFB

item.title: CVE-2022-39857|2024-08-03T12:07:42.904Z -- samsung%20mobile -- factorycamerafb
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in CameraTestActivity in FactoryCameraFB prior to version 3.5.51 allows attackers to access broadcasting Intent as system uid privilege.
